DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of the study is that the use of Cannabis will attenuate the tinnitus level as experienced by the patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Cannabis in the Treatment of Tinnitus Patients
DOC.criteria: Tinnitus lasting more than 3 months Tinnitus Handicap Inventory score over 58 Treated previously for tinnitus (2 modalities) Prior use of drugs Current use of Cannabis Neurologic or Psychiatric disease Heart Failure Ischemic Heart Disease Immune Deficiency Acoustic Neuroma
